StatDef.label: global accuracy
StatDef.description: Accuracy when firing at targets on the world map. Multiplied by the operator's gravship targeting skill.

StatDef.label: substructure support multiplier
StatDef.description: A multiplier to the maximum substructure supported by the gravship.

StatDef.label: maintenance sensitivity
StatDef.description: A factor of the difficulty to maintain this structure, as well as the speed at which its maintenance will deplete.
